overview:
From Silicon Valley to Tech Valley, Messier leads boutique tech PR firm Portfolio PR Group. The agency provides companies the public relations counsel, planning and execution of public relations and social media.

As the manager of the agency team, her credentials include:

10+ years multi-platform PR and marketing Roster includes tech companies from Silicon Valley to New York Specialty in technology and consumer PR Business, consumer and trade press contacts

AP-trained writer, social media practitioner Implemented digital media campaigns Managed teams of 10+ PR staffers Large scale, global conference management

Excellent writing and verbal communications Integrate social media into traditional PR tactics and strategy

Her career portfolio includes technology companies like:

*Citrix Systems *Kitware *Apprenda *TheInfoPro *ScanBizCards *Check Point *Pantone *RSA Conference *Goodmail Systems *Varonis *Adobe *Palm *Interwoven *Extreme Networks *Variegated *TargetX *Assembla

Specialties

Articulating complex technologies to achieve top tier press coverage.

Strategic thinker who will roll up her sleeves to get the job done.

Tech sector experience includes enterprise technologies, software development, networking, security, web services, storage, desktop and server virtualization, cloud computing, mobile apps, SaaS, semiconductors, compliance, clean tech, CRM, consumer and luxury goods, e-commerce and application delivery.
